'''Phantom Realm: Immernachtreich Keep''' is a part of the [[Summertime Odyssey]] event. It is unlocked after completing [[Summertime Odyssey: IV]] and takes place in the [[Immernachtreich Keep]] domain.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Immernachtreich Keep 1.png
|text1  = The Nachtraben's Regard will randomly descend upon the "Immernachtreich Keep" during combat. Characters will obtain the corresponding buffs after entering the AoE of the Regard."
|image2 = Tutorial Immernachtreich Keep 2.png
|text2  = 3 forms of Nachtraben's Regard exist:<br>Waltz: Summons a night raven to aid in battle. During this time, it will continuously fire Freikugel at nearby opponents for 10s.<br>Unison: Deals AoE Electro DMG to nearby opponents every 2s for 8s.<br>Reprise: The character's Energy is restored to 100% and the Elemental Burst CD is reset."
}}
